I kinda wanna ask where you can learn Japanese–

@Melissa and Zoe Ram 
I'm Japanese, so I don't think I can give you any effective advice. I hear that many people learn Japanese by listening to anime, TV dramas and songs. I think it would be easier to learn Japanese if you start with fields that interest you in Japan.
@わんさねこ Thank you for responding! And thanks for the advice ^^
Thanks!

@Melissa and Zoe Ram  I would recommend Tofugu to learn and memorize hiragana and katakana(first) then Wanikai for Kanji. You  can also use Tofugu for grammar. I'm somewhat a beginner myself right now im learning Kanji
